name: Lying Underground
description:
Lying Underground is a game developed during the first Community Game Jam of 2019.

You will play as Bill, an old and sick man living underground.

Through simple controls, you will have to trigger mecanisms when they are blinking, or you will damage them. After 3 failures, the mecanism will become inactive and you will loose a life.

When all mecanisms are broken, game over.

Good luck & have fun !
